titles.title: To prohibit the National Science Foundation from providing financial support for travel to Antarctica by writers and artists.
To prohibit the National Science Foundation from providing financial support for travel to Antarctica by writers and artists.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Research and Technology.

bill.summary: Prohibits the National Science Foundation (NSF) from providing financial support for writers and artists to travel to Antarctica.
